Name: the Circinus Federation
Description: The Circinus Federation is a minor Periphery state nestled anti-spinward of the Lyran Commonwealth/Free Worlds League border. Founded in 2770 by fleeing Marik mercenaries and later joined by Lyran survivors of the Amaris Crisis in 2785, the Federation has evolved into a unique society. Settlers turned farmers form the backbone of the economy, providing stability and the illusion of a respectable agrarian nation. However, the true power lies with the Black Warriors, a feared mercenary band who serve as the Federation's military. While President McIntyre, the current ruler, maintains a fragile peace with the Commonwealth and Free Worlds League through a series of reconciliation treaties, the Black Warriors' allegiance is divided. Some pledge loyalty to the President, while others remain loyal to the Cirion family, the traditional leaders of the Black Warriors. This internal tension often leads to piracy and raids, straining relations with neighboring powers.
ReputationStatements: Please, we are but poor farmers trying to survive, and we suffer greatly because of your past actions. We beg of you to undertake this small task against those who would oppress us.
We can offer you contracts that match our rivals. We beg you—please don't prey on us any more, but instead work with us by accepting this contract.
Commander, you have defeated us in combat before, so we know you are a competent mercenary unit. Please take this contract on and let us work together rather than against each other.
The duly elected government of the Circinus Federation has a contract for a mercenary group of your caliber, if you are interested.
You fight well, Commander, and we've both benefited from our relationship in the past. I have another contract for you, which will benefit us both.
Ahoy, Commander, It's good to see you. I've got another job for you, one where a good bit of loot, err, I mean profit, can be had.
Ahoy Matey! It's good to see you again, I have a really juicy job for you, with plenty of loot to be had!
MissionSuccessStatements: Well done, Matey! You finished off that contract easily, and your share of the loot, err, I mean payment, is already in your account.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: You'd never make it in the Black Warriors with that sort of cowardly attitude! I'll partially pay you this time, but complete the damn contract next time, or else!
BadFaithFailureStatements: I should cut out your heart and feed it to my dog for failing—err, I mean you'll get no payment from us.
